articles.author: Elliot Leavy, ACQUAINTED
articles.title: Year of the dragon: We have entered the AI age - VentureBeat
articles.description: Like the Year of the Dragon roaring in today, 2024 will mark the year where AI is applied in real, tangible ways.
articles.content: If you were hoping that the world would get over AI fever in 2024, you are going to be sadly mistaken. Advancements in hardware and software (everywhere) are opening up the floodgates to dynamic appl… [+1359 chars]

articles.title: Jeff Bezos Sells 12 Million Amazon Shares For $2 Billion - NDTV
articles.description: Amazon.com founder Jeff Bezos sold around 12 million shares of the online retail and cloud services firm for roughly $2 billion, according to a company filing on Friday, soon after laying out a plan to sell his shares over the next year.
articles.content:
Jeff Bezos founded Amazon as a bookseller in 1994. (Representational)

articles.title: Why Nvidia Is Entering The $30B Market For Custom Chips - Forbes
